segments.text: The order is so urgently required that we have to ask you to speed up shipment . If shipment is too late , we'll have to turn to other suppliers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , but we can't advance shipment . The manufacturers are fully committed . They have no stock on hand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you find some way for an earlier delivery ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How's this then ? We propose partial shipment . We can ship whatever is ready to meet your urgent need instead of waiting for the whole lot to get ready .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We propose to deliver 50 % in June and the balance in Aug .
segments.speaker: S2
